content: --मुख --वदन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} having the face downwards; °खी तिष्ठति; °खैः पत्रिभिः <ls>R. 3. 57.</ls> {2} head-long, precipitate, flying downwards. {3} upside down, topsyturvy. (--खः <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. ( --खाखी) <ab>N.</ab> of a plant गोजिह्वा Premna Esculenta. (--खं (नक्षत्रं) {1} flying downwards, having a downward motion; these {%nakshatras%} are: मूलाश्लेषा कृत्तिका च विशाखा भरणी तथा . मघा पूर्वात्रयं चैव अधोमुखगणः स्मृतः .. <ls>Jyotiṣa</ls>. {2} <ab>N.</ab> of a hell.
